subject: Sponsorship Inquiry – DeadEndReece (Sim Racing Content Creator)
description_text:
Simsonn Team

My name is Reece, though I go by DeadEndReece across my platforms.

I’m an up-and-coming content creator focused entirely on sim racing and
sim-driving content.

I stream daily on Twitch, where I currently average between 10–30 viewers
per stream, I also run a growing Discord community dedicated to sim
drivers, many of whom are actively looking to upgrade their equipment.


I’m reaching out because I’m extremely interested in your products,
especially as my current setup is nearing the end of its lifespan.

I’ve been following your development closely, including the wheelbase,
which I’m very excited to see once it’s ready.

I would love to explore the possibility of a sponsorship or partnership
with Simsonn, whether that includes a discount code, product reviews, or
any collaboration you feel would be mutually beneficial.

I believe your equipment would be a perfect fit for my content and my
community, and I would be thrilled to showcase your products to my audience.


Thank you for your time, and I’d be happy to provide any additional
information you may need.

I look forward to the possibility of working together.


Kind regards,

Reece

DeadEndReece

Twitch: https://twitch.tv/deadendreece

Discord: https://discord.gg/WDeb9fxuhq
